channel.title: Fatigue
channel.description:
so i went onto runescape classic server today and i saw the sleeping thing so i was thinking would it be a good idea to add in to my server and make it so every minute your fatigue goes down by 1% and at the top of your screen There will be an interfacee whith your remainder of Fatigue left you had left on top of your screen and when you sleep your Fatigue Goes to 100% and your prayer points and Helth Goes to 100% And it saves your character and during a quest you can get the sleeping bag which makes it so you can sleep anywhere unless you are in combat the wildy or stuff like that so the bag would be usfull for when you are skilling and tell me what your think it should do at 0%
Also i Made 2 interface tell me which one you like the best
This one [img]http://i1337.photobucket.com/albums/o670/Christian_Mark_Zack_Harrison/Capture_zps31b5f1cd.png[/img] I Need to make all the image transparient uncept the Background Or this one [img]http://i1337.photobucket.com/albums/o670/Christian_Mark_Zack_Harrison/BedPic_zps36526d49.png[/img]
Woud it be a good idea if not why ?

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

TheTutMan:

yu could make it so you have to enter your bank pin or a code which is diffrent everytime you sleep

this, you could generate a random integer and make them enter it, but ultimately…

Lin:

Didn’t work in RSC, won’t work in RS2.

Read full topic

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

kill boy 98:

maybe not the spec but and the point is it could stop bots coz if you dont do it. It kills you you die

Yeah because making a script click on a sleeping bag and waiting a minute in-between cutting logs is impossible, right? I’ve never heard of bots on a private server anyway besides auto clickers to get magic up and a few N-R bots here and there.

Read full topic

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:9, topic:477593”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=595788.msg4195694#msg4195694 date=1357463508]
It is an pretty coool idea.
Imagine:

You have 99 construction and you can make a bed in your house.
And if you click sleep on the bed.
Then you will go into the bed and get those ZZZZzzzzz things above your head.
When you lay you see your HP restore, Engery restore and special attack bar restore rather fast.
Would be pretty cool
[/quote]

You can also expect to see Player Killers exploiting this like crazy for Special Attack restore. They’ll rush with Weapons such as an Armadyl Godsword and nothing else. There must be balance and counters to successfully create.[/quote]

Maybe but a lot of servers and pk servers have alreayd those spec altars so really doesnt matter that much and if you add this as something to built for construction and you first have to teleport to your house and sleep which takes like a minute to restore everything, then I don’t think people will really use this for pkin.

Read full topic

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:8, topic:477593”]It is an pretty coool idea.
Imagine:

You have 99 construction and you can make a bed in your house.
And if you click sleep on the bed.
Then you will go into the bed and get those ZZZZzzzzz things above your head.
When you lay you see your HP restore, Engery restore and special attack bar restore rather fast.
Would be pretty cool :)[/quote]

You can also expect to see Player Killers exploiting this like crazy for Special Attack restore. They’ll rush with Weapons such as an Armadyl Godsword and nothing else. There must be balance and counters to successfully create.

Read full topic

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you’re standing in one place for an hour, you’re going to be less fatigued than if you were chopping trees or swinging a pick at some rocks. If you decided to add that, you should take that into consideration.

Read full topic

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

What’s the point? All it does is make you click a button every hour and a half and wait though a screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Fatigue
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

luna-scape:

Maybe but then add you cant sleep more then 2times a day?

This would limit the amount of gameplay as a Browser-Based Pay2Win game does. This is not what you want.

On Topic: I like it, but it doesn’t add to the mechanics of features as it should. Perhaps adding other things such as Healthpoint restoration?

Read full topic

item.description:

bad idea i wouldnt play a server that had this feature it would be annoying as fuck
